title: 690: BITCOIN LIKELY HEADING TO $5 MILLION PER BTC - HERE’S WHEN!!!! SCREAMING BUY SIGNAL!!!!
description:
What will one Bitcoin be worth by the end of 2021, 2022, 2025, 2030 and 2040?!

This is the million dollar question I answer for you in today's show revealing the latest BTC price predictions from top crypto analyst.

Discover when the Bitcoin price is most likely to reach the following epic milestones, ranging from $100K, $500K, $1M, $5M, $10M & even $20M per BTC.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
